lorfords-x-turner-pocock-collection.Name: TP Classic Chair
lorfords-x-turner-pocock-collection.Body:
Timeless and refined, the Classic chair provides that special comfortable place in any number of settings. Voluptuous feather and down cushioning and a classic form are complemented by soft curved arms with pleated details. The simple straight skirt and subtly contoured design will make the most of any chosen fabric. The Classic armchair is made for relaxation, and is sure to be a favourite for years to come.

For more about Lorfords collaboration with Turner Pocock click here.

lorfords-x-turner-pocock-collection.Name: TP End of Bed Bench
lorfords-x-turner-pocock-collection.Body:
Modern design and traditional upholstery processes inform this versatile bench. Refined frame detailing is complemented by a hand stitched cushion, finished with an understated decorative banding around the base. The End of Bed Bench is elegantly designed to fit in narrow spaces and provides a comfortable seat that is also a unique design statement. Fully upholstered, this lovely bench feels just right in the bedroom, but has enough style to stand alone in a hallway.

For more about Lorfords collaboration with Turner Pocock click here.

The sleek straight skirt with corner pleats gives a smart finish to the luxurious feather and down cushioning. Elegant turned Oak legs hide beneath the skirt and are finished with our signature brass castors.

lorfords-x-turner-pocock-collection.Body:
A clean, curved silhouette is paired with a simple seat cushion finished with intricate stitching. This practical chair offers real comfort despite its compact size. A design-driven alternative to a highly cushioned occasional chair, the Fireside chair possesses as much utility as it does style. Contrasting fabrics may be used, and there is the option of fully upholstered legs, or a subtle leg cap detail in either hardwood or brass.

lorfords-x-turner-pocock-collection.Body:
This large contemporary sofa will take pride of place in any sitting room with its luxurious, deeply cushioned seat and back. The Modern sofa is a contemporary design, but is still built using traditional hand tied coil springs and artisanal upholstery techniques. The straight skirt is the finishing touch on this simple elegant sofa, and box arm cushions ensure maximum comfort whatever the seating arrangement may be.

For more about Lorfords collaboration with Turner Pocock click here.

new-products.Name: The Ebury Armchair
new-products.Body:
This unique scroll back armchair is a wonderful blend of traditional elements with a quirky modern touch. It's the ideal piece for a study or drawing room, and its interesting form imparts the role of an occasional chair, admired for its characterful design.

The sinuous form of this occasional chair is complemented by an elegant turned Oak leg, capped with antique brass castors. The back legs stretch out behind, creating a wonderful arch to the side profile. The modest feather cushion on this chair is finished with lovely little tufts, a nice touch of detail on this smoothly formed piece.

The fabric on the model pictured is Lorfords Vintage Cloth. This fabric is an excellent upholstery fabric, sustainability sourced, and naturally dyed. A simple, slubby linen with plenty of character due to its vintage nature. You can find out more about these special fabrics here.

new-products.Body:

A splendid spot to rest your feet, this versatile piece can also function as a seat with a small footprint, perfect for a dressing room, or hiding away under a desk. This beautiful little stool is available in two heights to match with your existing furniture.

new-products.Name: The Laundry Box
new-products.Body:
Our inaugural upholstered storage box, the Laundry Box, is a simple, slim octagonal box. This sleek design features a short timber foot, with the lid secured by a charming brass chain when open.

This beautiful little box is perfect for keeping the clutter of laundry hidden away, and can be upholstered to match any interior scheme. We hope that this special little design will change the way that you look at a laundry basket, something to match or contrast with your interiors, rather than a purely functional afterthought.

The model pictured here is covered in our Vintage Cloth, our natural and sustainable fabric option. You can find out more about these special fabrics here.

About The Elmstead

The Elmstead is an elegant sofa of timeless design. A nod to a traditional Regency sofa, but with contemporary reworking, the clean, curving lines of the frame looks equally at home in modern and traditional interiors.

The Elmstead is a sofa you really sit back into with a sweeping rake to the back. We think it looks fantastic with a generous helping of scatter cushions.

sale.Name: The TP Classic Sofa | Ex- Press Model
sale.Body:
An ex-press TP Classic sofa in excellent condition, and available now. This generously cushioned sofa is an elegant mix of traditional comfort and modern design. The fashionable straight skirt gives this sofa a contemporary air, whilst maintaining all the comfort of traditional British furniture. Like many of our sofas, this piece is finished with tapered Oak legs and solid brass castors.

The fabric on this sofa is GP&J Baker’s Weathered Linen in Ochre. A fairly heavy linen cloth with a washed, slightly variegated colouring. This linen hangs beautifully in a skirt, and is an excellent weight for upholstered furniture.

One available, viewable upon request.


Dimensions
Height: 84cm
Width: 200cm
Depth: 96cm

If you love this sofa but would like to use your own fabric please get in touch with us to discuss the reupholstery process.

About The TP Classic Sofa

A generously proportioned two seater sofa with full width cushion and subtle curved arm detail, our Classic sofa epitomises everyday luxury. The sleek straight skirt with corner pleats gives a smart finish to the luxurious feather and down cushioning. Elegant turned Oak legs hide beneath the skirt and are finished with our signature brass castors.

sale.Name: Custom Kingston sofa | Ex-Press Model
sale.Body:
A beautiful little Kingston sofa in perfect condition, and available now. This sofa is nearly new, having only been used as part of a notable designer’s exhibit at an exclusive London art show. This custom Kingston sofa is slightly smaller than our standard model, but still features the same extraordinarily soft feather and down cushions. Finished with a simple straight skirt, this pretty little sofa would be right at home nestled into a country cottage, or gracing a polished high rise apartment.

The fabric on this model is Johnston’s of Elgin, Fresco in Tundra. This beautiful wool linen mix is a soft, high quality cloth, woven in Scotland.

One available, viewable at our Tetbury showroom.


Dimensions
Height: 83cm
Width: 176cm
Depth: 94cm

This sale price is inclusive of VAT and fabric.

If you love this sofa but would like to use your own fabric please get in touch with us to discuss the reupholstery process.

About The Kingston

The quintessential English country house sofa that has become as at home in town or country. Restrained low-swept arms almost disappear behind voluminous pillows of luxurious feather and down. It doesn’t get more comfortable than this!

sale.Name: The Belmont Sofa
sale.Body:
The Belmont sofa combines a structured silhouette with the neatest of down feather cushioning. The Belmont is sure to elevate any space in your home, with its elegant style and incredible comfort. Covered in a beautiful GP&J Baker Grantly fabric in Indigo/Red with turned oak legs to the front and antiqued brass cup castors to complete the look.

One available, viewable at our Stroud Workshop.

About The Belmont Sofa

The Belmont Sofa is based on the most elegant of the Howard & Son's models; The Baring. With a high down content in seat, back and arm cushions, this sofa is the perfect mix of timeless design and comfort.

sale.Name: The Camberwell Sofa | Ex - Showroom Model
sale.Body:
A showroom model of our Camberwell Sofa, covered in 100% Linen in Soft White. This model is in great condition and features a decorative tack finish to the front arm face. This piece has never been used and has been in our workshop storage, this piece was made in November 2022. 

The Camberwell is a classic country house chesterfield. Beautifully drawn with a generous outswept curve, long simple straight lines and bold turned legs, this low-backed sofa is just at home in a drawing room, at the end of a bed, or beneath a window.

A timelessly simple and elegant design, the Camberwell works beautifully in both contemporary and traditional interiors.

This model is viewable at our Stroud Workshop. 

This price is inclusive of VAT and fabric.

This is a press model, covered in a beautiful linen hand printed in England by Rapture and Wright; Hannah in Seafoam colourway. The Oak legs are stained in our whitewash colour, with antique brass castors capping the front legs. Two small scatter cushions accompany this seat to provide a touch more lumbar support and a little flair.

This piece is in excellent condition, it has been covered for the occasion of a fabric launch photoshoot, and returned to our storage.

sale.Body:

Covered in an off-white boucle, with beech turned legs capped by brass castors. This piece epitomises clean, crisp, British luxury. Fully traditional, with hand stitched horse hair build up, soft springing and feather cushioning across the arms and back, and of course a generous feather and down seat cushion. This sofa would look excellent in a modern space, whilst offering the comfort of a traditional handcrafted sofa.

Please note this showroom model does have some marks on the arms as seen in images.

sale.Name: The Belgravia Sofa
sale.Body:
A Belgravia sofa in good condition, and available now. This sofa has never been used. The fabric was stained during installation to a clients house by the painter, please reference images for the location of the stains. Apart from that the sofa is in immaculate condition. 

This traditionally upholstered sofa is superbly comfortable, with sprung seat, back, and arms, hand stitched edges for unrivalled longevity, and finished with generous sacks of natural feather and down. Sitting on an elegant turned leg, the Belgravia is a beautifully handcrafted British sofa, perfect for a sprawling country estate.

The fabric on this model is Fermoie, Figured 110 in Green. 

One available, viewable on request.

About The Belgravia

The Belgravia is a refined and traditional model with genteel proportions and excellent pedigree. Our take on the Howard & Sons ‘Portarlington’, it oozes country house charm.

Similar to our Mayfair, but smaller proportioned, it nevertheless contains the same luxuriously high down content.

A refined and traditional seat, it could be described as the miniature cousin to our grand Mayfair. Rounded and sumptuous cushioning is in the tradition of great English upholstery with. Turned oak legs and antiqued brass cup castors complete the look.

This version of our Belgravia includes covering in our sustainable vintage cloth. We have an edited colour range available of vintage linen and hemp cloth, each hand dyed in small batches using only natural materials. These beautiful fabrics have a magnificent depth of colour, and you can find out more about these very special fabrics here.

A versatile armchair with turned legs and sewn in cushioned back that combines comfort and style.

sale.Name: The Hanover Armchair | Showroom Model
sale.Body:
This ex-showroom Hanover armchair is in fine condition, and available to buy now. This chair is a fantastic example of our iconic library chair, a refined occasional chair, perfect for reading, study or as a decorative piece. With a lightly raked back terminating in a gentle scroll, a slim feather and down seat cushion, and hand carved Oak legs finished with solid brass castors. This chair is the perfect blend of comfort and traditional English style.

This exquisitely crafted chair is covered in an elaborately embroidered fabric by GP&J Baker, Winchelsea. There are some minor flaws to the legs, however these have been re-waxed to mitigate any damage, pictured below.

One available, viewable upon request.

About The Hanover

A faithful copy of one of the most beautiful Regency library armchairs we have ever owned. Simple lines, elegance and comfort come together in a timeless and unusual design that is equally at home in a modern apartment or a classical country house library.

the-armchair-collection.Name: The Bayswater Armchair
the-armchair-collection.Body:
Ultimate comfort in a compact size, the Bayswater’s enduring appeal is testament to the wonderful design that has been popular for drawing rooms to cottages for nearly 150 years. Soft yet supportive, this is a chair for every occasion.

the-armchair-collection.Name: The Langton Armchair
the-armchair-collection.Body:
The Langton is a handsome chair with strong simple lines and superb comfort. It is sophisticated and versatile, has a hand-sprung back with down cushion for utmost luxury, and looks great in drawing rooms, bedrooms or in the office.

the-armchair-collection.Name: The Ebury Armchair
the-armchair-collection.Body:
This unique scroll back armchair is a wonderful blend of traditional elements with a quirky modern touch. It's the ideal piece for a study or drawing room, and its interesting form imparts the role of an occasional chair, admired for its characterful design.

The sinuous form of this occasional chair is complemented by an elegant turned Oak leg, capped with antique brass castors. The back legs stretch out behind, creating a wonderful arch to the side profile. The modest feather cushion on this chair is finished with lovely little tufts, a nice touch of detail on this smoothly formed piece.

The fabric on the model pictured is Lorfords Vintage Cloth. This fabric is an excellent upholstery fabric, sustainability sourced, and naturally dyed. A simple, slubby linen with plenty of character due to its vintage nature. You can find out more about these special fabrics here.

the-armchair-collection.Name: The Kingston Armchair
the-armchair-collection.Body:
The armchair version of our Kingston sofa, based on the Howard & Sons ‘Ivor’ model. It is all charm and simplicity with neat, classic Howard arms and generous cushions. A versatile armchair that suits all manner of interiors.

the-armchair-collection.Body:
A chic blend of modern styling and comfort. The Elmstead’s curved and sweeping arms add movement to the otherwise unfussy linear profile referencing the best of Regency elegance. Dressed up or down, with skirts or loose covers, the Elmstead great-looking practicality can find a home in any room in the house.

the-armchair-collection.Name: The Elmstead Loveseat
the-armchair-collection.Body:
This is a twist on our ever popular Elmstead sofa which we pared down to make a generous seat for one or a cosy seat for two. It is, like the original, an elegant piece of timeless design. A nod to traditional Regency style furniture, but with contemporary reworking, the clean, curving lines of this frame look equally at home in modern and traditional interiors.

the-armchair-collection.Name: The Camden Armchair
the-armchair-collection.Body:
The Camden is an easy blend of simple lines and comfort. Compact and stylish, it is a great chair for smaller spaces where the design provides maximum comfort in the smallest of footprints. A beech frame with a hand-tied coil sprung seat reflects our commitment to traditional methods, and yet the simplicity of the Camden easily lends itself to the clean lines of a contemporary home. Dressed up in a skirt or fringing however, and it is as pretty as a picture in a country cottage or drawing room.

the-armchair-collection.Name: TP Classic Chair
the-armchair-collection.Body:
Timeless and refined, the Classic chair provides that special comfortable place in any number of settings. Voluptuous feather and down cushioning and a classic form are complemented by soft curved arms with pleated details. The simple straight skirt and subtly contoured design will make the most of any chosen fabric. The Classic armchair is made for relaxation, and is sure to be a favourite for years to come.

For more about Lorfords collaboration with Turner Pocock click here.

the-armchair-collection.Name: TP Fireside Chair
the-armchair-collection.Body:
A clean, curved silhouette is paired with a simple seat cushion finished with intricate stitching. This practical chair offers real comfort despite its compact size. A design-driven alternative to a highly cushioned occasional chair, the Fireside chair possesses as much utility as it does style. Contrasting fabrics may be used, and there is the option of fully upholstered legs, or a subtle leg cap detail in either hardwood or brass.

For more about Lorfords collaboration with Turner Pocock click here.

the-headboard-collection.Name: The Rose | Lorfords Contemporary x Natasha Hulse
the-headboard-collection.Body:
The Rose headboard is constructed with solid beech wood frame, from FSC certified sources, traditionally webbed to the back and layered with 100% natural latex foam.  

Price includes vintage linen and artwork as seen on the imagery. 

To learn more about our collaborations with Natasha Hulse, click here.

This headboard shape can be supplied, using your own choice of fabric and without artwork. For custom quotes please contact us. 

The image is a king size model but this headboard is available to manufacture in bespoke sizes. 

Also available with bespoke detailing including stud work, piping and deep-buttoning. 

Installation options
Split Battens - Free of charge
Floor standing - £100 surcharge
Please contact us to confirm our current lead times

Price shown is inclusive of VAT.

The Moroccan’s iconic shape combines a sleek, near eastern inspired form with simple curved lines. Its soft, padded upholstery is handmade to your specifications, bringing style and originality to any bedroom. 

All our headboards are available in bespoke sizes and with bespoke detailing including stud work, piping and deep-buttoning. 

Installation options
Split Battens - Free of charge
Floor standing - £100 surcharge
Please contact us to confirm our current lead times

Price shown is inclusive of VAT.

the-ottoman-collection.Name: The Laundry Box
the-ottoman-collection.Body:
Our inaugural upholstered storage box, the Laundry Box, is a simple, slim octagonal box. This sleek design features a short timber foot, with the lid secured by a charming brass chain when open.

This beautiful little box is perfect for keeping the clutter of laundry hidden away, and can be upholstered to match any interior scheme. We hope that this special little design will change the way that you look at a laundry basket, something to match or contrast with your interiors, rather than a purely functional afterthought.

The model pictured here is covered in our Vintage Cloth, our natural and sustainable fabric option. You can find out more about these special fabrics here.

the-sofa-collection.Name: The Traditional Elmstead Sofa
the-sofa-collection.Body:
The Traditional Elmstead Sofa is a timeless blend of elegance, comfort, and tradition. On a beech frame, the seat and back are built from hand-tied coil springs, to give the ultimate in luxurious support. With its restrained out-swept arms and gently sloping back, it is quietly graceful, yet maintains a generous seat area, remaining as practical as it is beautiful. The simplicity of the Traditional Elmstead is at home in every interior; from a country cottage to an industrial penthouse conversion. The Traditional Elmstead includes two scatter cushions as pictured, for support on this generously deep seat.

the-sofa-collection.Body:
This sofa is a twist on our ever popular Traditional Elmstead model. This version has the addition of plump feather and down back cushions, the “down back”, which gives it a plumper silhouette with more support. The seat cushions tuck neatly under the back cushions, resulting in a supremely soft, cushioned seat. Like the original, this is an elegant sofa of timeless design. A nod to a traditional Regency style sofa, but with contemporary reworking, the clean, curving lines of the frame look equally at home in modern and traditional interiors.

vintage-cloth.Name: The Traditional Elmstead Sofa
vintage-cloth.Body:
Our Traditional Elmstead sofa, covered in all natural antique cloth.

The Traditional Elmstead Sofa is a timeless blend of elegance, comfort, and tradition. This iconic form takes its cue from classic English Regency style sofas, and is the most popular sofa in our collection. With its restrained out-swept arms and gently sloping back, it is quietly graceful, yet maintains a generous seat area, remaining as practical as it is beautiful.

This version of our Traditional Elmstead includes covering in our ethical vintage cloth. We have a refined colour range of vintage linen and hemp cloth, hand dyed in small batches using natural materials. These magnificent fabrics have excellent colour saturation and intriguing textures. You can find out more about these special fabrics here.

vintage-cloth.Name: The Hanover Armchair
vintage-cloth.Body:
Our elegant Hanover armchair, covered in antique cloth. The perfect finish to this ethically crafted library chair.

The Hanover is a reproduction of the most beautiful Regency library chair we have ever seen, an elegant Rosewood and leather armchair, with just the right detailing and proportions. The restrained form of the Hanover is suited to a classic library setting, and can add a touch of grace to a modern interior.

This version of our Hanover is covered in the most conscious fabric we could find. We have curated a limited colour range of vintage linen and hemp cloth, each hand dyed in small batches using entirely natural materials. These beautiful fabrics are saturated with earthy colour, permeated by unique woven textures. You can find out more about these very special fabrics here.

vintage-cloth.Name: The Brompton Sofa
vintage-cloth.Body:
Our handsome Brompton sofa, covered in a conspicuously conscious fabric.

The Brompton sofa is comfortable yet elegant, it maintains a relatively slim profile whilst containing ample feather and down cushioning. This sofa is characterised by its trim, sloping arms, with an unmistakable curve and subtle front recess. A traditionally English design, and a contemporary interpretation of the classic Howard & Sons sofa, the Beckett.

This version of our Brompton is covered in our alluringly sustainable vintage cloth. We have a refined colour range of vintage linen and hemp cloth, hand dyed in small batches using only natural materials. These wonderful fabrics display a magnificent depth of colour and unique textures. You can find out more about these exclusive fabrics here.

vintage-cloth.Name: The Kingston Armchair
vintage-cloth.Body:
Our stately Kingston armchair, covered in the most environmentally conscious fabric available.

The Kingston armchair is all charm and simplicity with neat, classic English arms and generous cushions. A matching chair to our Kingston sofa, with the same superbly soft cushioning to the seat and back. The Kingston seeks to emulate the excellent form of the Howard & Sons Ivor armchair, an iconic and timeless English design. 

This version of our Kingston chair is covered in our answer to a sustainable upholstery fabric; vintage cloth. We have curated a limited colour range of vintage linen and hemp cloth, each hand dyed in small batches using only natural materials. The beautiful woven textures of these fabrics are enhanced by an exquisite depth of colour. You can find out more about these distinctive fabrics here.

vintage-cloth.Body:

The Hampton Footstool packs masses of comfort into its petite proportions, a small stool to complement any of our more traditional, generously cushioned sofas or chairs. The Hampton is a simple stool topped with a 4” cushion of lofty, luxurious feather and down.

This version of our Hampton footstool includes covering in the most conscious fabric we could find. vintage-cloth.Name: The Mayfair Sofa
vintage-cloth.Body:
Our indulgent Mayfair sofa, covered in sustainable antique cloth.

The Mayfair sofa is the most luxuriously cushioned sofa in our collection, with indulgent proportions and a high feather and down content, our customers have described this sofa as ‘like sitting on a cloud’.  The Mayfair is an abundantly cushioned sofa with calming curves throughout its design, it is a strong statement of English opulence and traditional form. This sofa is our answer to a classic country house sofa, inspired by the highly traditional Howard & Sons Wimborne sofa. 

This version of our Mayfair sofa includes covering in vintage cloth; our answer to a sustainable upholstery fabric. We have a refined colour range of vintage linen and hemp cloth, hand dyed in small batches using entirely natural materials. The beautiful woven textures of these fabrics are enhanced by the richly saturated colour. You can find out more about these distinctive fabrics here.

vintage-cloth.Name: The Langton Armchair
vintage-cloth.Body:
Our elegant Langton armchair, covered in beautifully sustainable vintage cloth.

A compact and carefully cushioned armchair, the Langton features a sprung seat and back finished with plenty of feather and down cushioning. The neat, Howard style scroll arm is perfectly complemented by a refined turned leg. A sophisticated armchair with considered proportions, this piece has a versatility that can take it from lounge to study, country home, to contemporary city apartment.

This version of our Langton armchair includes covering in our ethically sourced vintage cloth. We have an edited colour range available of this vintage linen and hemp cloth, each hand dyed in small batches using only natural materials. The beautiful woven textures of these fabrics are enhanced by the richly saturated colour. You can find out more about these distinctive fabrics here.
